article.headline: Utah Valley St. 71, Louisiana-Lafayette 41
article.story: OREM, Utah -- Josh Olsen scored 19 points to lead Utah Valley to a 71-41 victory over Louisiana-Lafayette on Saturday. What appeared to be a close game turned into a blowout as two Wolverines scored in double figures. Ryan Toolson, last season's independent player of the year, chipped in with 14 points while Jordan Swarbrick added 9 for the Wolverines. A 33-22 halftime lead for Utah Valley (3-0) quickly spread to a 21-point advantage as the Wolverines went on a 12-2 run to start the second half. Travis Bureau led Louisiana-Lafayette (0-2) with 15 points. La'Ryan Gary added 9 for the Ragin' Cajuns.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
